entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETests.ServerRenderingTests.FormHandlingTests.FormWithParentBindingContextTest.EnhancedFormThatCallsNavigationManagerRefreshDoesNotPushHistoryEntry` #54757
  • AuthenticationService.ts used in Microsoft.Authentication.WebAssembly.Msal missing popup-Api #54756
  • Quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETest.Tests.ThreadingAppTest.IsStarted`, and `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETest.Tests.ThreadingAppTest.HasHeading` #54754
    9.0-preview5
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #54749
  • Fix breaking change when using lazy loading with webcil #54746
  • Byte rate metrics #54745
  • Virtualize and displaying content at the end of the list #54742
  • Virtualize component doesn't work with hidden elements #54741
  • Avoid resetting AccessFailedCount by CheckPasswordSignIn in ASP.Net Identity #54733
  • In Blazor Web App InteractiveWebAssembly, using select with onchange event does not work when clicking from dropdown, but work with up/down key from keyboard. #54732
  • Unhandled exception: When using popup components on an InteractiveServer page and navigating to any other InteractiveServer page #54731

Closed

  • [SupplyParameterFromQuery] property not being set during OnInitializedAsync #53055
    8.0.3
  • [extensions] dependency out of date #54753
  • ASP.NET Core 8 Web API causing blocking behavior #54730
  • MissingMethodException IsComponentDisposed() after update to .NET 7.0.17 #54614
  • First page load or any subsequent refreshes always utilize Blazor Server, while booting WebAssembly in the background #54570
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #54718
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #54717
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #54719
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #54720
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #54721
  • Perf improvement: https #54729
  • "Onclick" JavaScript invocations no longer working after upgrade to .NET 8.0 from .NET 7.0 #54560

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine 'ThreadingAppTest.HasHeading' and 'ThreadingAppTest.IsStarted' #54755
    area-blazor
  • Fix dockerfile references for helix #54752
    area-infrastructure
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.4.24175.4 #54734
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Add retry for `WebViewManagerE2ETests.CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton` #54751
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Auto-generated baselines by 1ES Pipeline Templates #54747
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Fix buildArgs, publishArgs in public #54750
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Remove internal args from public build #54748
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Set correct ProductVersion for productVersion.txt #54710
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Quarantine tests in `ServerRenderingTests.FormHandlingTests.FormWithParentBindingContextTest` #54758
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Preserve RemoteAuthenticationContext during trimming if used in JS interop #54655
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.5
  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure
  • Use constant values for CorsPolicy.cs and CorsPolicyBuilder.cs #54247
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • [release/8.0] Convert to 1ES templates #54660
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
